iConfirmThatIGiveMyConsentTxt:
I confirm that I give my consent to South Gloucesteshire Counsil to carry out a status check on an ongoing/permission required before each check’ basis. 

I understand that I am able to see who has carried out a status Check, and when they did so, from my online account, and that I may withdraw my consent at any time.
iDeclareThatToTheBestOfMy: I declare that to the best of my knowledge and belief, the above answers are true and complete and that I have not with-held any material information.
iConfirmThatIHaveSignedUpToThe: I confirm that I have signed up to the DBS update service, and understand I am giving permission for Bristol City Council to check my DBS status as necessary.
ifYouWishToWithdrawYourConsent: If you wish to withdraw your consent in the future, please notify the council in writing.

des1: Report emergencies instantly with photos, videos, and location tags. Your report can save lives. Together, we build a safer community.
des2: Quickly filter incidents by type—accidents, natural disasters, roadblocks, and more—so you can focus on what matters to you.
des3: Visualize incidents on an interactive map. Tap icon inside map to see location in your preferred map app.
